description: Add allowed IP addresses or ranges to access this share. By default, no IP address or range is allowed. File Storage can only be used with OVHcloud IP addresses (Public Cloud, Managed Kubernetes Service).

add.label: Add a new access
add.success: Your ACL (Access Control List) has been successfully added
add.error: An error has occurred adding the ACL: {{errorMessage}}

accessTo.invalidFormat: Invalid format: please enter a valid IP address or IP range (for example: 10.0.0.0/24)
